name: Potted Plant
description: Elves draw and extra Treasure after defeating it.

name: Maul Rat
description: A creature from hell. +3 against Clerics.

name: Lame Goblin
badStuff: He whacks you with his crutch. Lose 1 level

name: Squidzilla
description: Slimy! Elves are at -4! Will not pursue anyone of level 4 or below except Elves.
badStuff: You are grabbed, slimed, crushed and gobbled. You are dead,dead,dead. Any questions?

name: Plutonium Dragon
description: Will not pursue anyone of Level 5 or below.
